title: The Short Story of ShaoWang - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   College/University   Devoted Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mpreg   Omegaverse   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: Little Ice Cube   冰块儿
description: The omega school tyrant, legendarily known as “Yan Ge”, Jiang ShaoYan’s heat is approaching. He thought he had no other choice but to seek out an alpha stronger than himself to get him through it, but suddenly an underclassman appeared saying he liked him? Wait, wait, wait, having such weak pheromones yet daring to hit on this Ge? This Wang isn’t that foolish, right?>
